programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: Brian and Chris, the discerning palates behind Burn Rate, turn their attention to the Grandeur Cremo cigar. They'll meticulously analyze its blend, construction, and smoking characteristics, offering their experienced insights into this intriguing offering. Tune in to discover if the Grandeur Cremo delivers on its promise of a refined smoking experience, according to Brian and Chris.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Join us as we take a behind the scenes tour of Florida's largest independent tobacco farm. Jeff Borysiewicz guides us through his tobacco farm, sharing tricks of the trade and everything that goes into the process of producing high quality cigar tobacco.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: In this episode of Unrolled, Sean explores Central Cigars, a cornerstone of St. Petersburg‚Äôs cigar scene, highlighting its rich history, expertly curated cigar selection, and the passionate community it fosters.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, owner of The Cigar Quarters - Dr. Anthony Grant - helps our host Bryan Baiss rate and review the La Rosa Negra cigar. Join us to find out how this stick stacks up to the rest!

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode of Texas Cigar Roadshow, we‚Äôre joined by Dave Yancey for a cigar pairing with Los Statos and Shibui Japanese Single Grain Whiskey. I‚Äôm smoking the Los Statos Robusto from General Cigar Company, while Stephen enjoys an LFD Colorado Oscuro Short Robusto. We also stop by Ash Red for this week‚Äôs Shop Stop!

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode, we‚Äôre joined by Christopher from the Texas Millennial Cigar Group. Ian and I are enjoying the Tobacco Cabana House Habano from Iconic Leaf, while Christopher lights up an Arturo Fuentes Don Carlos Corona.

programme.title: The Burn Down Podcast
programme.desc: We wanted to see what AI thought about cigars. We ask ChatGPT questions about cigars... What are the best cigar and drink pairings? What is the best cigars? What are the best cigar and food pairings? Do you know The Burn Down Podcast?!?

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co.
programme.desc: In this episode, Dave, Noah, and Connor unveil the first-ever Creekside Cigar Club shipment, highlighting their authentic approach to curating boxes filled only with cigars they genuinely smoke and love, rather than random selections or discounted items. The March box features five "killer" cigars: the versatile Rodriguez Reserva Privada, the naturally sweet Serino Wayfarer 109, the balanced Crown Heads Coroneta Habano, the intensely cinnamon and pepper Aganorsa Leaf Rare Leaf Reserve Corojo, and the full-bodied, sweet Habano-like Domain Neutron. They express gratitude to their growing community of subscribers and emphasize their commitment to supporting the people and brands that make the cigar industry special.

programme.title: September 18, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for September 18, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guest Malcolm-Jamal Warner
programme.desc: Malcolm-Jamal Warner was Theo on the Cosby Show but his career and his life are way bigger than that. We go through his whole career from Cosby to Malcolm and Eddie (which was contentious) to his fascinating musical career. This is an awesome conversation.

programme.title: At Home with The Jenners - Planting Roots

programme.title: Catemaco: Magia y Misterio
programme.desc: Una familia normal va de vacaciones a Catemaco, Michoacan un pueblo famoso y pintoresco en Mexico. Todo marcha bien hasta que son atacados por criminales, el padre sobrevive, y con ayuda del brujo mayor del pueblo cobra venganza.

programme.title: El Pistolero
programme.desc: Uno de los hombres más poderosos de México llega a un pueblo en busca de nuevos pistoleros que quieran formal parte de su equipo, y recluta a un hombre sencillo que acepta el trabajo porque quiere vengar la muerte de su padre.

programme.title: El Cartel de la Línea
programme.desc: UNA MUJER Y SU HIJO ESTÁN EN BÚSQUEDA DE SU ESPOSO ERNESTO DESPUÉS DE QUE FUE DEPORTADO DE ESTADOS UNIDOS A TIJUANA BAJA CALIFORNIA MEXICO, SIN SABER NADA DE SU PARADERO. MIENTRAS TANTO ERNESTO CONOCE A DON DIEGO QUIÉN LO ENSEÑA A TRABAJAR EN CARROCERÍA. Y EN ESE TALLER LLEGA EL PRIMO UN JEFE DE UN CARTEL Y LE OFRECE TRABAJO A ERNESTO PARA GANAR DINERO FÁCIL.

programme.title: Gritos del Monday
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de Ingeniería Ambiental realizan un trabajo en la Reserva Ecológica de los Saltos del Monday, conocido por su rica fauna y su rica historia. Para el trabajo, los alumnos deciden acampar en el lugar, en medio de la obscura noche son sorprendidos por un hecho que desencadenará a lo largo de sus días posteriores, en especial a una de las estudiantes.

programme.title: Choele
programme.desc: Todo ocurre en el pueblo de Choele Choel, provincia de Río Negro. Un niño y su padre intentan seguir juntos todo el verano, pero el chico ya decidió partir hacia otro lugar con su madre, cuando ésta llegue y le recoja. A la zona donde viven llega una chica, por la que comienzan a competir padre e hijo.

programme.title: El Campeón
programme.desc: LA HISTORIA DE UNA PROMESA DEL BOXEO, SU ENTRENADOR SOLO LO USA PARA BENEFICIO PROPIO. LA FAMA Y EL DINERO SOLO LE TRAE PROBLEMAS, ADEMAS QUE SUFAMILIA SE APROVECHA DE EL.

programme.title: Reto Sangriento
programme.desc: Dos jóvenes investigadores de fenómenos paranormales reciben el reto de pasar un fin de semana en una casa donde habitan seres malignos. Esto con el fin de presentar las evidencias en su programa de televisión y levantar el rating, pero lo que no saben es que el reto les costara muy caro.

programme.title: Añoranzas de mi Madre
programme.desc: Ana, una mujer ambiciosa, arrogante y sin escrúpulos ha perdido el verdadero significado de la vida, de los sentimientos y de la Naturaleza misma. Al momento de fallecer su madre hace un viaje fantasioso a través de una regresión inesperada, donde su propia madre infante la guía, para conocer sus ancestros, sanar su pasado y por consecuencia su presente.

programme.title: New Number Same Name
programme.desc: If you’re looking at what’s next and feeling nervous, remember this: What God has done in your life is only the foundation, not the finish line. He’s a creative God, still at work in ways you’re not expecting. Let go of your plan so God can show you His purpose.

programme.title: Running For A Reason
programme.desc: Our expectation of God must not be that there will never be anything chasing us in life but that we are chosen while we are chased. In “Running For A Reason,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that even though God has placed something significant in us, certain development can only happen in the caves of our lives.

programme.title: Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief
programme.desc: The belief that we need something other than God is what keeps us from going through breakthroughs. That’s how we can be in covenant with God but still in captivity. In “Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us break up with what’s been holding us back.

programme.title: Rescue Your Testimony
programme.desc: Pastor Steven Furtick helps us deal with disappointment and revive our hope in “Rescue Your Testimony.” You’ll be encouraged to tell your story through the lens of God’s faithfulness.

programme.desc: Anthony strives to prove himself as medical lead responding to a snowmobile crash on Togwotee Pass.

programme.title: Backcountry Rescue 2016 E02 - Home Safe
programme.desc: The first priority of every mission is team safety, so when conditions on Pyramid Peak threaten Jake and Cody during a rescue, Tim demands they pump the breaks.

programme.title: Alaska's Wild Gourmet 2016 E03 - Hunters Paradise
programme.desc: Bradley taps into the Kodiak wild for ingredients to incorporate into a rustic hunter’s gathering at the top of Pillar Mountain.

programme.title: Alaska's Wild Gourmet 2016 E04 - Native Celebra
programme.desc: Bradley and his family celebrate Kodiak’s native history by offering an extreme catering experience to local Alutiiq tribes.

programme.title: Trev Gowdy's Monster Fish 2018 E03 - Falcon Lake Bass
programme.desc: Pro angler Kelly Jordon travels to Falcon Lake to hunt down 10–12 pound Largemouth Bass.

programme.desc: 250 miles off the eastern coast of Australia, lies Wreck Reef, home to monster-sized

programme.title: Carter's W.A.R. 2016 E02 - White Gold
programme.desc: Ivan Carter works save a key elephant from ivory poachers near Africa’s famous Kruger National Park.

programme.title: Backcountry Rescue 2016 E03 - Married to the Job
programme.desc: Jake and Marilynn cancel a dinner party so they can respond to an injured skier on Teton Pass.

programme.title: Giant Sturgeon versus Monster Swordfish
programme.desc: GIANT STURGEON VERSUS MONSTER SWORDFISH. Fred Lavitman battles Giant Sturgeon in British Columbia, while Al McGlashan lands monster Swordfish off the southern coast of Australia.

programme.title: Big Stone's Gills & Bass
programme.desc: The guys catch giant bluegills and then change gear to go bass fishing on Big Stone Lake on the Minnesota/South Dakota border.

programme.title: The Sneaky Sneak
programme.desc: Dave has a sneaky little trick for catching smallmouth.

programme.title: Spring on Lake Summersville
programme.desc: It's spring and the buck bass are making beds. Pro John Crews and Byron Childers join Charlie and Ben and get a ton of bites.

programme.title: Torch Lake Atlantic Salmon
programme.desc: Beautiful Torch Lake is the place to be for spring Atlantic salmon.

programme.title: Epic Waters & Sportfishing Wonders - IFTV - 2024
programme.desc: The In-Fisherman staff takes you to Epic Waters and shares Sporting Fishing Wonders, as they travel to Cree Lake, a world-class fly-in destination for pike and lake trout. They ponder with you: Just what makes a sportfish a sportfish? And why do some fish jump? So, too, is there action for beastly striped bass, one of the toughest freshwater fish swimming.

programme.title: Flint River Walleye
programme.desc: Flint Wilderness walleye love rivers and they also love jigs.

programme.title: Super Slabs of Texas
programme.desc: Catching giant roaming white crappie in northeast Texas.

programme.title: Big Topwater Bass
programme.desc: BASS Pro Bobby Lane and Steve target heavy-cover bass. Great topwater action!
